abstract: Ali Akbar Salehi, Atomic Energy Organization of Iran head, issues optimistic statement about progress in negotiations over his country's nuclear program, which contrasts with more measured statement released by American officials; Salehi makes statement prior to meeting with United States Energy Sec Ernest J Moniz in Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: Contrasting assessments were delivered Tuesday in Switzerland as the deadline neared for a framework agreement on limiting Iran’s disputed nuclear program.

headline.main: Iran and U.S. Differ on Optimism About Nuclear Talks
headline.print_headline: Iran and U.S. Differ on Optimism About Nuclear Talks

snippet: Contrasting assessments were delivered Tuesday in Switzerland as the deadline neared for a framework agreement on limiting Iran’s disputed nuclear program.
